content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1448347192284{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1449136877107{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

Quality and Performance at the right price

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text]Transcargo Ltd. is one of the world’s leading providers of end-to-end supply chain solutions. We combine intercontinental Air and Ocean Freight with comprehensive Value-Added Logistics Services and Supply Chain Services. The range of Supply Chain Solutions can vary from simple transport or storage up to complex operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text]We optimize all activities around information, material and financial flow. We provide globally integrated end-to-end solutions tailored to our customers’ supply chain management needs with a special commitment to industry specific requirements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1451375199426{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}” el_class=”base_bg_color”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449136946410{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449136957585{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][stm_icon icon_size=”73″ icon_height=”100″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ icon=”stm-transport839″ title=”Air Freight” text=”Setting the standard in air freight. Our global network has the power to help businesses grow — based on years of experience and influenced by the changing needs of our customers. Our Road specialists will ensure operational excellence as well as cost-effective solutions.” link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449136961602{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][stm_icon icon_size=”89″ icon_height=”100″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ icon=”stm-ship” title=”Sea Freight” text=”TransCargo is the world’s fourth largest provider of ocean freight services. In 2013, TransCargo expedited nearly 1.5 million TEUs via ocean freight. The company’s relationship with customers is moving away from purely transactional business to value-added propositions.” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff” link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449136951770{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449136966415{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][stm_icon icon_size=”89″ icon_height=”100″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ icon=”stm-transport842″ title=”Road Freight” text=”TransCargo’s worldwide network is well positioned and qualified to help your company develop efficient and tailor-made domestic and trans-border programs for distributing your goods. Our Road specialists will ensure operational excellence as well as cost-effective solutions that meet your needs in terms of transit time.” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff” link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449136971250{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][stm_icon icon_size=”89″ icon_height=”100″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ icon=”stm-warehouse” title=”Warehousing” text=”Our asset-light operating model allows us the ability to choose the correct qualified subcontractors based on diverse customer requirements with an emphasis on compliance, safety, security, professionalism and environmental leadership.” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff” link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”secondary_bg_color” css=”.vc_custom_1448346766847{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_cta h2=”Not sure which solution fits your business needs?” shape=”square” add_button=”right” btn_title=”Contact Now” btn_style=”outline” btn_shape=”round” btn_color=”white” btn_i_align=”right” btn_i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-arrow-next” btn_add_icon=”true” el_class=”secondary_bg_color” btn_link=”url:%2Fcontacts%2F||”][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1449137019491{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1449137011806{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

Effective solutions

You benefit from our experience in delivering effective solutions to the complex global supply chains of some of the world’s biggest corporations. You benefit from every innovation, whether it involves a simple extension to our Air and Ocean Freight products, whether it means a development in warehousing, or whether it requires a completely new integrated supply chain model.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”666″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”secondary_bg_color services_icons reset-sm-paddings” css=”.vc_custom_1453118792113{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1449204255225{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-right: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;padding-left: 115px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon icon_size=”67″ icon_height=”90″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ align=”center” icon=”stm-security” title=”Safe & Secure” text=”You benefit from our experience in delivering effective solutions to the complex global supply chains of some of the world’s biggest corporations.” icon_color=”#ffffff” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1449204260881{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-right: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;padding-left: 115px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon icon_size=”67″ icon_height=”90″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ align=”center” icon=”stm-fast-delivery” title=”Fast Delivery” text=”You benefit from every innovation, whether it involves a simple extension to our Air and Ocean Freight products, whether it means a development in warehousing.” icon_color=”#ffffff” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1449204266169{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-right: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;padding-left: 115px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon icon_size=”67″ icon_height=”90″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”500″ align=”center” icon=”stm-support” title=”24/7 Support” text=”All of which explains why you’ll find the team of outstanding support at TransCargo ready to apply their passion for solutions in support of your business.” icon_color=”#ffffff” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
